verses.verse: חָ֭כְמוֹת <S%H2454><s%> Wisdom בָּנְתָ֣ה <S%H1129><s%> hath builded בֵיתָ֑הּ <S%H1004><s%> her house חָצְבָ֖ה <S%H2672><s%> she hath hewn out עַמּוּדֶ֣יהָ <S%H5982><s%> pillars שִׁבְעָֽה׃ <S%H7651><s%> her seven

טָבְחָ֣ה <S%H2873><s%> She hath killed טִ֭בְחָהּ <S%H2874><s%> her beasts מָסְכָ֣ה <S%H4537><s%> she hath mingled יֵינָ֑הּ <S%H3196><s%> her wine אַ֝֗ף <S%H637><s%> has also עָֽרְכָ֥ה <S%H6186><s%> she hath also furnished שֻׁלְחָנָֽהּ׃ <S%H7979><s%> her table

שָֽׁלְחָ֣ה <S%H7971><s%> She hath sent forth נַעֲרֹתֶ֣יהָ <S%H5291><s%> her maidens תִקְרָ֑א <S%H7121><s%> she crieth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> From גַּ֝פֵּ֗י <S%H1610><s%> upon מְרֹ֣מֵי <S%H4791><s%> the highest places קָֽרֶת׃ <S%H7176><s%> of the city

מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> Whoever פֶ֭תִי <S%H6612><s%> Whoso [is] simple יָסֻ֣ר <S%H5493><s%> let him turn in הֵ֑נָּה <S%H2008><s%> here חֲסַר־ <S%H2638><s%> hither [as for] him that wanteth לֵ֝֗ב <S%H3820><s%> understanding אָ֣מְרָה <S%H559><s%> she saith לּֽוֹ׃

לְ֭כוּ <S%H1980><s%> Come לַחֲמ֣וּ <S%H3898><s%> eat בְֽלַחֲמִ֑י <S%H3899><s%> of my bread וּ֝שְׁת֗וּ <S%H8354><s%> and drink בְּיַ֣יִן <S%H3196><s%> of the wine מָסָֽכְתִּי׃ <S%H4537><s%> [which] I have mingled

עִזְב֣וּ <S%H5800><s%> Forsake פְתָאיִ֣ם <S%H6612><s%> the foolish וִֽחְי֑וּ <S%H2421><s%> and live וְ֝אִשְׁר֗וּ <S%H833><s%> and go בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in the way בִּינָֽה׃ <S%H998><s%> of understanding

יֹ֤סֵ֨ר ׀ <S%H3256><s%> He that reproveth לֵ֗ץ <S%H3887><s%> a scorner לֹקֵ֣חַֽ <S%H3947><s%> getteth ל֣וֹ קָל֑וֹן <S%H7036><s%> to himself shame וּמוֹכִ֖יחַ <S%H3198><s%> and he that rebuketh לְרָשָׁ֣ע <S%H7563><s%> a wicked מוּמֽוֹ׃ <S%H3971><s%> [man getteth] himself a blot

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תּ֣וֹכַח <S%H3198><s%> Reprove לֵ֭ץ <S%H3887><s%> not a scorner פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> or יִשְׂנָאֶ֑ךָּ <S%H8130><s%> lest he hate הוֹכַ֥ח <S%H3198><s%> thee rebuke לְ֝חָכָ֗ם <S%H2450><s%> a wise man וְיֶאֱהָבֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H157><s%> and he will love

תֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> Give לְ֭חָכָם <S%H2450><s%> [instruction] to a wise וְיֶחְכַּם־ <S%H2449><s%> [man] and he will be yet wiser ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> will be still הוֹדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> teach לְ֝צַדִּ֗יק <S%H6662><s%> a just וְי֣וֹסֶף <S%H3254><s%> [man] and he will increase לֶֽקַח׃ <S%H3948><s%> in learning פ

תְּחִלַּ֣ת <S%H8462><s%> [is] the beginning חָ֭כְמָה <S%H2451><s%> of wisdom יִרְאַ֣ת <S%H3374><s%> The fear יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> God וְדַ֖עַת <S%H1847><s%> and the knowledge קְדֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H6918><s%> of the holy בִּינָֽה׃ <S%H998><s%> [is] understanding

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בִ֭י יִרְבּ֣וּ <S%H7235><s%> shall be multiplied יָמֶ֑יךָ <S%H3117><s%> For by me thy days וְיוֹסִ֥יפוּ <S%H3254><s%> shall be increased לְּ֝ךָ֗ שְׁנ֣וֹת <S%H8141><s%> and the years חַיִּֽים׃ <S%H2416><s%> of thy life

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If חָ֭כַמְתָּ <S%H2449><s%> If thou be wise חָכַ֣מְתָּ <S%H2449><s%> thou shalt be wise לָּ֑ךְ וְ֝לַ֗צְתָּ <S%H3887><s%> for thyself but [if] thou scornest לְֽבַדְּךָ֥ <S%H905><s%> alone תִשָּֽׂא׃ <S%H5375><s%> thou alone shalt bear

אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> woman כְּ֭סִילוּת <S%H3687><s%> A foolish הֹֽמִיָּ֑ה <S%H1993><s%> [is] clamorous פְּ֝תַיּ֗וּת <S%H6615><s%> [she is] simple וּבַל־ <S%H1077><s%> and יָ֥דְעָה <S%H3045><s%> knoweth מָּֽה׃ <S%H4100><s%> nothing

וְֽ֭יָשְׁבָה <S%H3427><s%> For she sitteth לְפֶ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> at the door בֵּיתָ֑הּ <S%H1004><s%> of her house עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּ֝סֵּ֗א <S%H3678><s%> on a seat מְרֹ֣מֵי <S%H4791><s%> in the high places קָֽרֶת׃ <S%H7176><s%> of the city
לִקְרֹ֥א <S%H7121><s%> To call לְעֹֽבְרֵי־ <S%H5674><s%> pass דָ֑רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> Who הַֽ֝מְיַשְּׁרִ֗ים <S%H3474><s%> who go right אֹֽרְחוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H734><s%> on their ways

מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> Whoever פֶ֭תִי <S%H6612><s%> Whoso [is] simple יָסֻ֣ר <S%H5493><s%> let him turn in הֵ֑נָּה <S%H2008><s%> here וַחֲסַר־ <S%H2638><s%> hither and [as for] him that wanteth לֵ֝֗ב <S%H3820><s%> understanding וְאָ֣מְרָה <S%H559><s%> she saith לּֽוֹ׃

מַֽיִם־ <S%H4325><s%> waters גְּנוּבִ֥ים <S%H1589><s%> Stolen יִמְתָּ֑קוּ <S%H4985><s%> are sweet וְלֶ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> and bread סְתָרִ֣ים <S%H5643><s%> [eaten] in secret יִנְעָֽם׃ <S%H5276><s%> is pleasant

וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יָ֭דַע <S%H3045><s%> But he knoweth כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that רְפָאִ֣ים <S%H7496><s%> not that the dead שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> are there בְּעִמְקֵ֖י <S%H6012><s%> [are] in the depths שְׁא֣וֹל <S%H7585><s%> of hell קְרֻאֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H7121><s%> [are] there [and that] her guests פ
